name: Kevin & Kevin Juice
address: 488 Gore Ave, Vancouver, BC V6A 2Z6, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Taste of Mexico
hasMenuItem.description: Mexican rice, roasted peppers, squash, roasted jalapeÃ±o guacamole, black bean-caramelized pineapple salsa, pickled radish and onion, sunflower and pumpkin seeds on mixed greens with cilantro and lime vinaigrette. Choose: mole chicken, shrimp or Tex Mex meat. Contains pecans.

hasMenuItem.name: Bellini Kombucha
hasMenuItem.description:
It’s bright & perfectly tart with fruity overtones of peaches & orange. Bellini continues to be a crowd favourite at parties & events.

Ingredients: green tea Kombucha* (filtered water, green tea*, Kombucha culture*, cane sugar*) jasmine essence*, rooibos*, Honeybush*, lemongrass*, lemon myrtle*, rosehips*, hibiscus*, black tea*, marigolds*, orange peel*, apple bits*, safflower*, hibiscus*, natural flavours *organic

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Wize Iced Tea
hasMenuItem.description:
Water, real brewed arabica coffee leaves, lemon juice, and cane sugar
Just one gram of cane sugar
Only 10 calories
35mg of diffused caffeine
Doesn’t break a fast, keeps you subtly energized without jitters or crash
Keto, vegan, gluten-free, and farm-direct

review.reviewBody: The potatoes are always magic and the juices are delicious
